attributes.title: Dump trump 🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: I opened the app and saw a pic of an orange instead of trump and my phone crashed for a whole week I am very dissatisfied with this disgusting app I will never use it again by the way I had to buy a new phone 🖕🏽

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is COMPLETELY problematic!! It’s poorly designed, ugly to look at, and half the stuff it says doesn’t even make any sense! DI NOT GET!! not to mention that the presidential candidate it supports is just 🤮🤮🤮. Can you imagine being such a rat of a human being?? DISGUSTANG!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app leaked all my pictures and made my phone crash , it also deleted all my contacts and I had to factory reset my phone after deleting this app

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Upon downloading the app it took exactly 33 hours to install. Once installed I opened the app and lost too many brain cells to where I had to be driven to the hospital. Now Whenever I hear trumps name I get 5 diseases that are incureable. Bad app

attributes.title: absolutely horrific
attributes.review: I was a girl in the village doing alright, and then I downloaded Trump. On a real note it took forrr eveerrrr too download. And once it was loaded, Trump texted me!! He said he wanted to clap my cheeks, and feed me dog food. I'm vv uncomfy. WE MUST SAVE BARRON. also in light of this #notoesforpresvoteBaryBenson

attributes.title: No one should support this
attributes.review: No one should support this it’s disgusting …you should decide to support this or not it’s your choice but this choice might ruin other people’s lives if it wasn’t wise🙄🙄

attributes.title: Glitches out constantly
attributes.review: I’ve had this app for a month and it keeps kicking me out and I have found a lot of false information

WARNING do not get this app!!! It takes FOREVER to download! Also, once I downloaded the app it didn’t even work properly. It gave my phone a virus so I had to get my phone fixed😐 To anyone looking to get this app....DONT. GET. IT.

attributes.title: Mrs. Donald Trump
attributes.review: This app actual trash because I went to open it and it didn’t load up😇 that got on my last nerve because I don’t understand this app. The amount of noise this app gives astronomical. So I’m unleashing my inner karren😇

attributes.title: This is unfortunate...
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app to support my president. But the app is terrible. It doesn’t work. It made my phone crash so many times. It also charged me and took my money.
